title: INSTANT DC, BANS, and LP LOSS
body:
So...
I have been getting instantly DC-ed the moment I load into a game. Bugsplat, reports, the whole thing. I have been time banned, demoted, lost promos, and all that because of the instant DC. I have reinstalled League, checked my internet, upgraded my computer, restarted the world--nothing helps. 
I get into ranked games with my Duo Partner and I DC. I lose 33 LP for it and get my bans (this is all after this happen for 2 other games and losing promos). 
SO, I play through my five bans alone in normals. Nothing happens, all is well. 
THE VERY NEXT GAME I PLAY with a duo I get instant DC AGAIN! I was in a chat call with him and the stupid game thinks I am just not playing because all the times I got instant DC-ed, it NEVER GAVE A REMAKE OPTION. Also, I sometimes I get back into the loading screen after reconnecting 5 times and I will load to about 50% and then it DCs again. Or whatever since it thinks I'm still in game and punishes me for it and won't allow a remake. 
So this is ONLY happening with I am in a DUO QUEUE. I apparently can play just fine alone. What the heck is going on? Why am I being punished for this crap? Why can't it get fixed?
Fun fact, I also have opened help tickets about it (especially after getting a "free loss" rather than a free win after getting into promos...wtf is THAT about??) but I have been ignored for almost a year now. I've opened 3 help tickets in a year and have never heard back. Not even exaggerating. 
Please help. This isn't funny any more, Riot. I have failed promos several times because of these bugs (and that free loss I wrote to you about with a screen shot and everything). If I can't play with friends, then this game needs to just be trashed. Stop punishing me for things I am no doing. I have suffered through the bans with grace but it's time to fix this.

*UPDATE*
Never mind, still DC even when playing alone. Now I have a 5 game 10 minute ban. Yay....#PunishTheInnocent

If you're seeing the bug splat at the champion loading screen, it's may be due to an out of date graphics driver. Let's make sure that your graphics card has all of its latest updates. If you're still crashing at the loading screen, go through each step in our [Bug Splat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#section-mac) and we should be able to narrow down the problem.

Hit me back up if you need any additional help!

There is also a riot post about crash's after the windows update[ here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update).

So you're only having this disconnection issue while in a duo queue with your buddy? Since you were also in chat call with him while duo queuing, this may in fact the result of an intermittent faulty connection. Follow our [Connections Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can narrow down the issue.

If you're trying to test certain adjustments to to see if it solved your disconnection issue, make sure you're doing those tests in a custom game so that you avoid getting the Leaverbuster punishments. While it may not seem fair to get punished for leaving a game due to a disconnect, this is still affecting the other players who have to go the rest of the match without a 5th teammate. 

Until we get this ironed out, be sure to test the steps outlined in the [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-windows) using a custom game.
